from.description: The address where the items will be sent from.

postcode.description: The postcode where the items will be sent from.

suburb.description: The suburb where the items will be sent from. This field is mandatory for StarTrack products, otherwise it is optional

country.description: The country code for the address.

to.description: The address where the items will be delivered.

postcode.description: The postcode for the address. This is mandatory for domestic shipments and shipments to International Kahala Posts Group. It is optional for other International shipments.

suburb.description: The suburb where the items will be sent from. This field is mandatory for StarTrack products, otherwise it is optional

country.description: The country code for the address.

item_reference.description: A unique reference for the item, generated by the merchant. This value must be unique across all items for the charge account.

length.description: The length of the parcel in centimetres. If volumetric pricing applies then this is mandatory.

width.description: The width of the parcel in centimetres. If volumetric pricing applies then this is mandatory.

height.description: The height of the parcel in centimetres. If volumetric pricing applies then this is mandatory.

type.description: Type of additional feature. Eg: TRANSIT_COVER.

attributes.description: Additional information about the product. Please note that feature attributes depends on the feature type.
